entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is looking for Professor Grubbly-Plank because his owl, Hedwig, is injured. He explains the situation to the second gargoyle.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl that has been injured and turned up after other post owls. Professor Grubbly-Plank examines her wing to determine the cause of injury.

entities.name: professor grubbly-plank
entities.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank is a professor who appears at Professor McGonagall's shoulder, smoking a pipe and holding the Daily Prophet. She examines Hedwig's wing to determine the cause of injury.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is watching as Professor Grubbly-Plank examines Hedwig's wing. She appears at the shoulder of the second gargoyle.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid has trained the Hogwarts thestrals not to touch owls, which is mentioned by Professor Grubbly-Plank as a possible explanation for Hedwig's injury.

entities.name: thestrals
entities.description: Thestrals are creatures that may attack birds, but Hagrid has trained the Hogwarts thestrals not to touch owls.

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, his owl that has been injured.
Professor Grubbly-Plank examines Hedwig's wing to determine the cause of injury.
